Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Oak Grove -- 1% S&U Tax Renewal - M&TC - 20 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Oak Grove Proposition
(Sales Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Oak Grove, State of Louisiana (the "Town"), be authorized to continue to levy and collect a tax of one percent (1%) (the "Tax") (an estimated $740,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year) upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the Town, all as defined by law, for a period of twenty (20) years from and after November 1, 2017, with the proceeds of the Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary costs and expenses of collecting and administering the Tax) to be dedicated and used for any lawful corporate purpose, including but not limited to, construction, repair maintenance and improvement of public streets, highways, bridges, alleyways, thoroughfares, sidewalks and appurtenant drainage facilities; construction and maintenance of drains and drainage canals and facilities incidental thereto; construction and improvement of recreational facilities; construction and purchase of equipment and facilities for Police Department?
